text:
Intrigued, I found the original Mackerel Stack at <https://archive.org/details/hypercard_the-mackerel-stack-154> and loaded it up in HyperCard running on <https://macos8.app/>. The stack is filled with long transitions composed of dithering effects, inversion, random sound effects, but the real treat is this TV dinner that I am stuck on. I also found a HyperCard memoir by the subject of both of those quotes, of course with it's own stylistic flair.
<http://www.kevinsteele.com/smackerel/black_white_00.html>
